channel.title: Rust on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on un01s notes

item.title: rustup
item.description: Update rust $ rustc --version rustc 1.78.0 (9b00956e5 2024-04-29) $ rustup update $ rustc --version rustc 1.81.0 (eeb90cda1 2024-09-04) Start to play with Tauri: node.js + rust => GUI App. There are examples of deno and tauri. Another interesting thing is WebUI in C with WebSocket, that uses browser as the GUI.

item.title: Rust on esp32
item.description: Start to look at the toolchain for Rust on ESP32 family modules. After some googling, here is the first result. Clearly the toolchain is working in its early stage. $ cargo build OK. Both espflash and espmonitor are working. Reference: Rust on ESP32 rust esp32 std demo
